title: Troubled Loner or Radical Recruit? In Political Violence, It’s Often Hard to Say
description: The attack on Nancy Pelosi’s husband has raised questions about the role of demonizing political speech in violent acts, not for the first time.
dc:creator: Max Fisher
media:description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi is shown as she left her home on Tuesday where her husband, Paul Pelosi, suffered an attack by assailant David DePape last week.
